alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills; Southwest Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 26 at 3:16PM MDT until March 27 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches across the Cody Foothills and 1 to 4 inches across the Southwest Bighorn Basin. * WHERE...Cody Foothills and Southwest Big Horn Basin. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Monday. The most widespread snow will occur later this afternoon and evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Expect roads to become slick and snow covered later this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Due to the showery and banded nature of the snow, amounts may vary over short distances.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Cody Foothills; Southwest Big Horn Basin
